subject: Elections
Steroids
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Former French Olympic hurdles champion Guy Drut joined former Australian finance minister John Fahey in the race to become the next chief of the World Anti-Doping Agency on Friday.
snippet: Former French Olympic hurdles champion Guy Drut joined former Australian finance minister John Fahey in the race to become the next chief of the World Anti-Doping Agency on Friday.
